mapper.sql: RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_CODE, ORDER_INDEX, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URL, PID, RESOURCE_TYPE, CREATER, CREATETIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME,RESOURCE_DESCRIBE,SHOW_TYPE,OPER_CODE,PLACE_CODE, RESOURCE_ICON,device_type,JUDGE_AUTHC,USE_FLAG

RES.RESOURCE_ID, RES.RESOURCE_CODE, RES.ORDER_INDEX, RES.RESOURCE_NAME, RES.RESOURCE_URL, RES.PID, RES.RESOURCE_TYPE, RES.CREATER, RES.CREATETIME, RES.MODIFY_USER, RES.MODIFY_TIME,RES.RESOURCE_DESCRIBE,RES.SHOW_TYPE,RES.OPER_CODE, RES.PLACE_CODE,RES.RESOURCE_ICON,RES.device_type,RES.JUDGE_AUTHC,RES.USE_FLAG
mapper.select: select from moirai_resource where JUDGE_AUTHC is not null and JUDGE_AUTHC != '' order by ORDER_INDEX

select
from moirai_resource RES ,moirai_product_resource pr WHERE pr.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND pr.RESOURCE_ID = RES.RESOURCE_ID AND RES.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND RES.USE_FLAG = 'Y'
AND device_type NOT LIKE concat(concat('%|' , #{resFilterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '|%')
order by RES.ORDER_INDEX asc

select
from moirai_resource RES ,moirai_product_resource pr WHERE pr.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND pr.RESOURCE_ID = RES.RESOURCE_ID AND RES.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND RES.RESOURCE_TYPE <> '4' order by RES.ORDER_INDEX asc

select distinct RES.JUDGE_AUTHC judgeAuthc, p.product_name productName, RES.RESOURCE_NAME resourceName from moirai_resource RES left join moirai_product_resource pr on RES.RESOURCE_ID = pr.RESOURCE_ID left join moirai_product p on pr.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE RES.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND RES.RESOURCE_TYPE = '4' and p.product_type = '0' and RES.JUDGE_AUTHC is not null AND RES.JUDGE_AUTHC <> '' order by RES.JUDGE_AUTHC

select
from moirai_resource where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND DEL_FLAG = 'N'

select
from moirai_resource WHERE DEL_FLAG = 'N'
AND RESOURCE_ID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY ORDER_INDEX

select
from moirai_resource WHERE DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y'
AND RESOURCE_ID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY ORDER_INDEX
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO moirai_resource (RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_CODE, ORDER_INDEX, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URL, PID,RESOURCE_TYPE, CREATER, CREATETIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME,RESOURCE_DESCRIBE,SHOW_TYPE,OPER_CODE,PLACE_CODE, RESOURCE_ICON,device_type,JUDGE_AUTHC ) VALUES
(#{item.resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.orderIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.resourceDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.placeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.judgeAuthc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into moirai_resource
RESOURCE_ID,
RESOURCE_CODE,
SHOW_TYPE,
ORDER_INDEX,
RESOURCE_NAME,
RESOURCE_URL,
PID,
RESOURCE_TYPE,
CREATER,
CREATETIME,
MODIFY_USER,
MODIFY_TIME,
DEL_FLAG,
USE_FLAG,
RESOURCE_DESCRIBE,
OPER_CODE,
PLACE_CODE,
device_type,
RESOURCE_ICON,
JUDGE_AUTHC,
#{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{useFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{resourceDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{placeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{judgeAuthc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update moirai_resource
RESOURCE_CODE = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_TYPE = #{showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_INDEX = #{orderIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_URL = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
USE_FLAG = #{useFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
RESOURCE_DESCRIBE = #{resourceDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_CODE = #{operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_CODE = #{placeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_ICON = #{resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGE_AUTHC = #{judgeAuthc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into moirai_resource_tenant
RESOURCE_ID,
RESOURCE_CODE,
SHOW_TYPE,
ORDER_INDEX,
RESOURCE_NAME,
RESOURCE_URL,
PID,
RESOURCE_TYPE,
CREATER,
CREATETIME,
MODIFY_USER,
MODIFY_TIME,
DEL_FLAG,
USE_FLAG,
RESOURCE_DESCRIBE,
OPER_CODE,
PLACE_CODE,
device_type,
RESOURCE_ICON,
JUDGE_AUTHC,
TENANT_ID,
SOURCE_FLAG,
#{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{useFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{resourceDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{placeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{judgeAuthc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sourceFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update moirai_resource_tenant
RESOURCE_CODE = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_TYPE = #{showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_INDEX = #{orderIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_URL = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
USE_FLAG = #{useFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
RESOURCE_DESCRIBE = #{resourceDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_CODE = #{operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_CODE = #{placeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_ICON = #{resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGE_AUTHC = #{judgeAuthc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE_FLAG = #{sourceFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO moirai_resource_tenant (RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_CODE, ORDER_INDEX, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URL, PID,RESOURCE_TYPE, CREATER, CREATETIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME,RESOURCE_DESCRIBE,SHOW_TYPE,OPER_CODE,PLACE_CODE, RESOURCE_ICON,device_type,JUDGE_AUTHC,TENANT_ID,SOURCE_FLAG ) VALUES
(#{item.resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.resourceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.orderIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.resourceDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.placeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.judgeAuthc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.sourceFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from moirai_resource_tenant RES ,moirai_product_resource pr WHERE pr.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND pr.RESOURCE_ID = RES.RESOURCE_ID AND RES.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND RES.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND RES.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND device_type NOT LIKE concat(concat('%|' , #{resFilterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '|%')
order by RES.ORDER_INDEX asc

select
from moirai_resource_tenant RES ,moirai_product_resource pr WHERE pr.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND pr.RESOURCE_ID = RES.RESOURCE_ID AND RES.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND RES.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by RES.ORDER_INDEX asc

select
from moirai_resource_tenant RES ,moirai_product_resource pr WHERE pr.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND pr.RESOURCE_ID = RES.RESOURCE_ID AND RES.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND RES.RESOURCE_TYPE != '4' AND RES.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by RES.ORDER_INDEX asc

SELECT tenant.TENANT_ID FROM moirai_resource_tenant tenant LEFT JOIN moirai_product_resource res ON tenant.RESOURCE_ID = res.RESOURCE_ID WHERE res.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY TENANT_ID;
